item.title: Kick off meeting eQUITY
item.description:
7th till the 10th of November 2010, Copenhagen, Denmark

Participants: Avermaete Tessa, Borrego Rute, Juniusdottir Ragnheidur, Kruse Ane, Lilleengen Anne-Marie, Mosdol AnnHild, Nissen Asta, Olafsdottir Anna Sigridur, Pettersen Sverre , Rchaidia Leila, Schoofs Greet, Sousa Joana, Svend Rossen Invited speakers: Tove Ingerslev, Katrine Kruse, Catharina Gro Nielsen

Second project meeting will be held 6-8 March 2011, Olso, Norway

item.title: First News Item
item.description: This is our very first News Item!
